markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Unnerving Prowess](/Feats.aspx?ID=880) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 35 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Aldori Duelist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=14)

**Prerequisites**
[Aldori Duelist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=876)

**Trigger**
You critically succeed at a Strike or Disarm with your Aldori dueling sword.

</column>

---

Your incredible skill with your blade unnerves your foes. You attempt to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) the target of your Strike or [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41). This Demoralize attempt does not have the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) trait, nor do you take a penalty to the check if the target doesn’t understand your language.
name: Unnerving Prowess

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 35 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**

**Trigger**
You critically succeed at a Strike or Disarm with your Aldori dueling sword.

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Make a free Demoralize check when you critically succeed with your dueling sword.
</summary>
